items.content_html: A Simple Text Repeater is a lightweight tool that takes user input and repeats it multiple times based on a specified count. It can be useful for generating repeated phrases, testing UI elements, or just for fun. Key Features: Customizable Repeats â€“ Users can set how many times the text should be repeated. Line Breaks or Single Line

items.content_html: A simple, lightweight web application that generates QR codes for URLs and Wi-Fi credentials. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript using the qrcode.js library, this app allows users to create QR codes and download them as PNG images.
